You and Rah enjoy hanging out together. Sometimes you hang out at your house, and sometimes theirs. You two like to play board games like river together.

One day, while at Rah's house they begin to pick up some sound on the radio parts they have been tinkering with. Rah enjoys tinkering with things, and had been messing with some radio parts they've found. But now, the radio is beginning to buzz.

"Hey! I'm picking up something!" Rah exclaims.

Ignore itListen
